Follow Tarry on

👉🏻 LiveAI 🇪🇺: https://liveai.eu 

Global professional with multicultural experience having lived and worked in U.S, Brazil, Singapore, #China, #Japan and Europe. Experienced, entrepreneurial and a well rounded data obsessed professional with over 20 years experience in multiple industries. 

Entrepreneur and SME with deep industry knowledge in deep learning, machine learning and artificial intelligence. Internationally acknowledged speaker, author, mentor and startup coach.

I have (co-)authored several research  publications and books – in research (ieee, ACM etc)as well as practical industry areas. Also proud to work with various humanitarian & NGOs like UN etc to help build the broken world with technology.

Highlighted domain expertise in:
1. AI & Data Skills: Digital & Data Analytics Transformation with Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence 
2. Innovation & Startup Growth: Advising Enterprises, startups and VC/PEs

profile_positions.description:
deepkapha AI Research (DAIRL) is a cutting edge AI research lab that brings entrepreneurial research to the fore-front. World around us is becoming increasingly complex with data and our L2P (lab to production) approach focuses on understanding and solving really hard problems with AI (ML & DL).

We work with both Leading Academia, European Institution, Executive Board of Global companies as well as Engineers, Managers, Architects step by step to enhance the adoption of Deep Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

With our "Applied AI" program, we then research and develop groundbreaking artificial intelligence algorithms and solutions for our partners and clients.

Industries focus => Energy, Automotives, Manufacturing, Education and Services.


About the founder

Tarry is the founder of DK AI Research. He’s interviewed regularly by the media Al-Jazeera, Associated Press etc. and features on international & National TV pertaining to AI & it’s adoption.
profile_positions.title: CEO, Board Director and AI Researcher

profile_positions.description:
ℝeal AI , a deepkapha AI Research sister company, develops groundbreaking solutions and products for various industry verticals such as energy, environment, education, policy, banking and services industry. 

To accelerate adoption within enterprises, we strive to simplify AI so our clients can assess their data assets, transform them with AI and grow.

Our approach is output driven. We analyse your data assets, quickly transform them into viable AI solutions and products and focus on building defensible business propositions for sustainable growth.
profile_positions.title: CEO & Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Scanning, Digitizing and Managing Subsurface Energy Assets With AI. Subsurface Assets we intend to quantify and propose drill and development strategy such as Digital Twin are:
-  Geothermal
- O&G (Faults, Fractures, Vugs, Bedding Planes, Well to Well Interpretation) 
- Carbon Monitoring and Management
- Mining (Li-Ion and more emerging minerals mining)

Earthscan.io belongs to “4th Dimension” Group Portfolio.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder | Investor

profile_positions.description:
LiveAI is a European 🇪🇺 EdTech program co-founded by Tarry Singh and Ms. Foke Van Der Helm with a vision to share and multiply knowledge for people that want to gain highly demanded skills through live online courses. 

LiveAI is created to accommodate the fast growing demand for our training, generated through
the immense global community support. It started out as an experiment in 2017, with workshops and applied various blended learning models on location to more than 27.500 learners so far.

What they discovered is that the real intrinsic process of “learning by doing” can only happen
when the following factors are in place: 1) hands-on learning from real world AI projects, 2) mentored by
seasoned industry professionals and 3) career guidance through experience. 

All instructors at LiveAI have been hand-picked to train their learners through mastery of in-demand skills. LiveAI offers aspiring participants globally, the opportunity to participate in some of the most
exciting and innovative markets in the world.
profile_positions.title: CoFounder & Principal AI Instructor

company.name: The University of Texas at Dallas

profile_positions.company: The University of Texas at Dallas
profile_positions.description:
In collaboration with CS department, I and my TAs deliver hard-core machine learning & deep learning bootcamps, conduct hackathons and teach students compressed yet focused industry relevant AI tools & techniques. 

This helps us to focus on developing talent, fostering innovation with companies and talent placements (within deepkapha.ai and other leading global companies focused on ML, DL & AI in our client network)
profile_positions.title: Visiting Faculty — AI, Machine Learning , Deep Learning

profile_positions.description: Writing for CognitiveWorld.com Forbes Site about AI and its impact on society and businesses. I will write frequently about applied AI in business domains, future of employment, career development and more relevant topics for the Forbes audience.
profile_positions.title: Contributing Editor -- Artificial Intelligence and its Impact on Business & Society

profile_positions.description:
Advisor and Trusted Client Partner to CxOs [CEO, CFO, CIO and CDO] of Global Blue Chip Clients on Digital & Data Analytics Transformation by uniquely deploying lean start-up methods. These methods developed from real-world startup experience such as Growth Multipliers — from envisioning "Book of Dreams" with client teams TO "Digital & Data Analytics Playbook" of Realistic Pilots with tangible multipliers. 

Focus areas:
- Digital Transformation (Cloud , Data Analytics, Machine learning & Artificial Intelligence) 
- Big Data,M2M & Internet of Things (IoT)
- IT Sourcing (Hardware, Software, Services)
- IT & Corporate Strategy: Org Design, Setup & Scale
profile_positions.title: Managing Consultant Digital & Data Analytics

profile_positions.description: Social Networking, Collaboration & Analytics SaaS Startup. Helped reorganise (from traditional services to product and cloud services), restructure and developed an enterprise social networking platform for both enterprise and SMB market.  Platform specs: Built on SharePoint / Azure Cloud & deployed within SaaS, PaaS & IaaS models.
profile_positions.title: CEO / Managing Partner

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Of The Board Of Advisors for Applied Data Science (AI, ML,DL)

company.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

volunteer_experiences.description: As advisory board member my role will be to help Utrecht University faculty develop world-class AI curriculum where students and industry professionals can participate in practical and real-world projects.

I coach, mentor and judge young startups from Universities across the world for Hult Prize, a startup accelerator for social enterprise named by President Bill Clinton and TIME Magazine as one of the top five ideas changing the world.

Winner is awarded $1M in seed funding via United Nations 🇺🇳 each year at UN New York HQ.

Here young students setup their startups to solve pressing global problems like energy crisis, joblessness.Through deepkapha.ai's philanthropy mission, I coache them personally to apply AI (Machine Learning and Deep Learning) in their business models to solve problems with technology at global scale.

Liliana Fonds is an organisation that helps children across the whole world with handicap. Currently we support this organisation financially and my personal goal is get more actively involved in participating in children's welfare, health, education and overall well-being. They are the future and we must invest in them. http://www.lilianefonds.nl

Blessed Generation Children's Center is a NGO project in Kenya supporting children who need tender love and safety. It goes further is providing basic education to children so they too can be part of this new world. They have three orphanages in Ruiru, Malindi en Nyamira. There is an outreach program to prevent children from becoming orphans as well. Website: http://www.blessedgeneration.nl

Blessed Generation Children's Center is een in Kenia gevestigde Non Governmental Organization (NGO) en staat onder leiding van de uit het Friese Hurdegaryp afkomstige Ria Fennema.
